title: Beyond PaaS: A smarter approach to cloud-native development in 2025 – Encore Blog
author: Marcus Kohlberg
description: Encore aims to be a flexible alternative to PaaS that lets you own your cloud.
sitename: Encore — Open Source Backend Framework for robust distributed systems
cntitle: 超越PaaS：2025年更智能的云原生开发方法——Encore博客
cndescription: Encore旨在成为PaaS的灵活替代方案，让您拥有自己的云。
